Description: Ostracon, large section of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey-black in section, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of at least eight lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394451) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394451)
